owner_summaries.key_concerns: Entity-level TB balances not zero, high flux analysis exceptions
High AP and AR reconciliation exceptions

residual_risks.description: Entity-level trial balance discrepancies could lead to misstated financials
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement automated reconciliation tools and enhance review processes

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicating potential operational inefficiencies
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Conduct detailed variance analysis and improve data accuracy
